name: Steady Parent Community
what_it_is: A private group of parents going through the same things you are — active, supportive, and ready to discuss how it really works.
founder_presence: Founders are active and present daily.

cta_copy.title: Talk it through with parents handling the same aggression
cta_copy.body: Next time you'll have ten parents who already tested your exact response and can tell you what happened after. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Share the weight with parents in the same spiral
cta_copy.body: Next time you're up at 2 AM googling symptoms, you'll have parents who've been in your exact spiral to ask instead. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Process it with parents whose kids feel everything too
cta_copy.body: Next meltdown, you'll already know what five other parents did in that exact moment and how the rest of the evening went. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Figure out the words with parents having the same conversations
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid asks a question you weren't ready for, you'll have parents who already found the right words at that age. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Work through it with parents rewriting the same script
cta_copy.body: Next time you catch yourself mid-sentence repeating what was done to you, you'll have people who understand exactly what that costs. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Talk it through with parents setting the same limits
cta_copy.body: Next time you'll have ten parents who already tested your exact boundary and can tell you if it held. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare notes with parents at the same table
cta_copy.body: Next refused meal, you'll know exactly which battles to drop because ten parents already tested that standoff with the same picky eater. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Figure it out alongside parents in the same fog
cta_copy.body: Next time you're holding a baby at 4 AM wondering if this is normal, you'll have someone awake who already checked. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Build your approach with parents asking the same questions
cta_copy.body: Next time two experts tell you opposite things, you'll have parents who tried both and can tell you what held up by Friday. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Sort through the research with parents who actually read it
cta_copy.body: Next time a headline makes you second-guess everything, you'll have parents who already dug into that study and can tell you what it actually found. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Get through it with parents mid-training right now
cta_copy.body: Next regression, you'll have parents one week ahead of you who can tell you exactly whether to push through or pause. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Set the rules with parents fighting the same screen battle
cta_copy.body: Next time you cave on the time limit, you'll have parents who already tried your exact rule and can tell you what held. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Figure it out with parents refereeing the same fights
cta_copy.body: Next blowup, you'll know whether to step in or wait it out because someone already tried both with the same age gap. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Get through tonight with parents fighting the same bedtime
cta_copy.body: Next curtain call, you'll have parents who already solved your exact stalling tactic and can tell you what finally stuck. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Talk it through with parents watching the same struggle
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid comes home with no one to sit with, you'll have parents who navigated the same thing and found what actually helped. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Breathe with parents raising the same kind of kid
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid is too loud, too much, too everything and nobody around you gets it, you'll have parents who do. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Work on it with parents managing the same triggers
cta_copy.body: Next time you feel the yell building, you'll have a dozen parents who already mapped your exact trigger and found what stopped it. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Debrief with parents who had the same kind of day
cta_copy.body: Next public meltdown, you'll already have a move that worked for someone whose kid did the exact same thing last Tuesday. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Stay connected with parents navigating the same distance
cta_copy.body: Next eye roll, you'll have parents who tried pushing and parents who backed off and can tell you which one kept the door open. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Get through it with parents facing the same upheaval
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid falls apart over the move, you'll have parents who already came out the other side and can tell you what helped. We are there with you daily too.

name: Beyond Hitting
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for responding to hitting, biting, and physical aggression at every age.

cta_copy.title: Start the Beyond Hitting course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for responding to hitting, biting, and physical aggression — so you know exactly what to do next time.

name: Childhood Anxiety
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for helping your child manage worry, fear, and avoidance behaviors.

cta_copy.title: Start the Childhood Anxiety course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides that help your child face worry and fear instead of being ruled by them.

name: Big Feelings
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for helping kids experience and process intense emotions safely.

cta_copy.title: Start the Big Feelings course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for helping kids experience intense emotions safely — without shutting them down or letting chaos take over.

name: Body Safety Conversations
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for age-appropriate body safety and consent conversations.

cta_copy.title: Start the Body Safety Conversations course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for having age-appropriate body safety and consent conversations you actually feel prepared for.

name: Breaking the Cycle
what_it_is: Audio lessons and guided exercises for identifying and changing inherited parenting patterns.

cta_copy.title: Start the Breaking the Cycle course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and guided exercises for identifying the patterns you inherited and building the ones you actually want to pass on.

name: Discipline Without Punishment
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for setting firm limits without punishment, threats, or yelling.

cta_copy.title: Start the Discipline Without Punishment course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for setting firm, clear boundaries without resorting to punishment, threats, or yelling.

name: Peaceful Mealtimes
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for ending mealtime battles using the division of responsibility approach.

cta_copy.title: Start the Peaceful Mealtimes course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for ending food fights using the division of responsibility — so everyone can actually enjoy dinner.

name: New Parent Survival
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for surviving and enjoying the first year without losing yourself.

cta_copy.title: Start the New Parent Survival course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for surviving and genuinely enjoying the first year without losing yourself in the process.

name: Intentional Parenting
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for building a parenting approach that fits your actual family.

cta_copy.title: Start the Intentional Parenting course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for building a parenting approach grounded in your real values, your real kids, and your real life.

name: The Science of Parenting
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated breakdowns of the research behind common parenting advice.

cta_copy.title: Start The Science of Parenting course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated breakdowns of what the research actually says — so you can stop second-guessing every decision.

name: Potty Training
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated day-by-day guides for stress-free potty training on your child's timeline.

cta_copy.title: Start the Potty Training course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated day-by-day guides for stress-free potty training that follows your child's readiness, not someone else's deadline.

name: Screen Sanity
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for managing screens without constant fights or guilt.

cta_copy.title: Start the Screen Sanity course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for managing screen time in a way that works for your family — without constant battles or guilt.

name: Sibling Harmony
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for reducing sibling conflict and building genuine connection between your kids.

cta_copy.title: Start the Sibling Harmony course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for reducing sibling conflict and helping your kids build a relationship that lasts beyond childhood.

name: Sleep Solutions
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for building sleep routines that stick, without cry-it-out or co-sleeping guilt.

cta_copy.title: Start the Sleep Solutions course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for building sleep routines that actually stick — without cry-it-out or co-sleeping guilt.

name: Social Skills
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for building your child's social confidence and friendship skills.

cta_copy.title: Start the Social Skills course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for building your child's social confidence so they can navigate friendships and conflict on their own.

name: Spirited Kids
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for parenting high-intensity children without breaking either of you.

cta_copy.title: Start the Spirited Kids course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for parenting a high-intensity child in a way that honors who they are without breaking either of you.

name: The Calm Parent
what_it_is: Audio lessons and guided exercises for staying regulated when your kids push every button you have.

cta_copy.title: Start The Calm Parent course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and guided exercises for staying regulated when your kids push every button — so you can respond instead of react.

name: The Tantrum Toolkit
what_it_is: Step-by-step audio lessons and illustrated guides for every tantrum scenario, from grocery store meltdowns to bedtime battles.

cta_copy.title: Start The Tantrum Toolkit course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for every tantrum scenario — from grocery store meltdowns to bedtime battles and everything in between.

name: Parenting Teens
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for staying connected through adolescence without becoming the enemy.

cta_copy.title: Start the Parenting Teens course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for staying connected through adolescence — even when they act like they want nothing to do with you.

name: Life Transitions
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for helping kids through major life changes with less anxiety.

cta_copy.title: Start the Life Transitions course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for helping your child through moves, new schools, new siblings, and other big life changes with less anxiety.

cta_copy.title: Compare notes with parents who got the same result
cta_copy.body: Next time someone questions your approach, you'll have parents who parent the same way and can tell you how it played out. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Swap bedtime tactics with parents running the same routine
cta_copy.body: Tomorrow night when you're back at the bedroom door, you'll already know what worked for parents who handle it the same way. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Talk through what you recognized with parents rewriting the same script
cta_copy.body: Next time you catch yourself mid-reaction, you'll have parents who spotted the same pattern and can tell you what they did instead. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare worry patterns with parents wired the same way
cta_copy.body: Next time your brain spirals at 3 AM, you'll have parents who overthink the same way and can tell you what was worth worrying about. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: See how parents with your love language make it land
cta_copy.body: Next time your connection attempt falls flat, you'll have parents who show love the same way and figured out what your kid actually receives. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Unpack your result with parents who got a different answer
cta_copy.body: Next time you wonder what your kid actually thinks of you, you'll have parents who closed the same gap between intention and impact. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: See how other parents lean into the same superpower
cta_copy.body: Next time your strength isn't enough for the situation, you'll have parents who scored differently and can show you a different playbook. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Debrief the night shift with parents who handle it the same way
cta_copy.body: Next time you're standing in the dark wondering if you're doing this wrong, you'll have parents who made the same 2 AM call and survived. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare eras with parents in the same parenting phase
cta_copy.body: Next time you feel stuck in this stage, you'll have parents living the same era who can tell you what shifted and what's coming. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Hash it out with parents running the same kind of team
cta_copy.body: Next time your co-parent handles it differently and bedtime falls apart, you'll have parents who navigated the same mismatch. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Get the real timeline from parents at the same stage
cta_copy.body: Next time you second-guess the signs, you'll have parents whose toddler scored the same and can tell you what happened next. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Talk through what the gaps mean with parents prepping the same kid
cta_copy.body: Next time you worry about September, you'll have parents who closed the same gaps and can tell you which skills actually mattered. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Get the first-foods playbook from parents who just did this
cta_copy.body: Next time your baby gags and you freeze, you'll have parents who started solids the same week and can tell you what's normal. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare notes with parents navigating the same nap transition
cta_copy.body: Next time 4 PM hits and everything falls apart, you'll have parents who dropped the nap at the same age and survived. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Talk through the decision with parents weighing the same call
cta_copy.body: Next time the invitation comes, you'll have parents who said yes and parents who said not yet, and both can tell you how it went. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Hear from parents who made the same decision both ways
cta_copy.body: Next time the question keeps you up, you'll have parents who went for it and parents who waited to tell you what happened. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Recharge with parents running on the same battery level
cta_copy.body: Next time you hit empty and still have three hours of parenting left, you'll have parents who found what actually recharges when nothing feels possible. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Swap screen rules with parents who scored the same way
cta_copy.body: Next time you hand over the tablet, you'll have parents who set the same limits and can tell you which ones held. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Talk through your child's score with parents tracking the same growth
cta_copy.body: Next time you're unsure if your child's reaction is age-appropriate, you'll have parents whose kids scored the same way to ask. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare notes with parents building the same social confidence
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid hangs back at the playground, you'll have parents whose child scored the same way and found what actually helped. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Unpack what it means with parents working on the same openness
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid shuts down instead of telling you, you'll have parents who rebuilt that trust and can tell you what shifted. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: See how other parents adapted the same kind of routine
cta_copy.body: Next time a step in your routine stops working, you'll have parents who built similar ones and can tell you what they swapped in. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare lists with parents assigning chores at the same age
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid refuses the chore that went fine yesterday, you'll have parents with kids the same age who found what actually sticks. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: See what worked when other parents tried the same tools
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid is mid-meltdown and the breathing card gets thrown across the room, you'll have parents who found what actually works. We are there with you daily too.
